Module io.github.mmm.base
Package io.github.mmm.base.filter

Interface CharFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ComposedCharFilter, ListCharFilter, NegatedCharFilter
    public interface CharFilter
    This is the interface for a filter that decides if a given character is acceptable or should be filtered.
    Unlike Predicate it avoids conversion of char to Character for performance reasons. It is especially used by {code net.sf.mmm.scanner.CharSequenceScanner}.

    • Field Detail

      • IDENTIFIER_FILTER

        static final CharFilter IDENTIFIER_FILTER
        A filter that only accepts characters valid for a technical identifier-string (e.g. literal oder variable-name). This means accepted characters are Latin digits, ASCII letters or one of '.', '_' or '-'.

      • LATIN_DIGIT_OR_LETTER_FILTER

        static final CharFilter LATIN_DIGIT_OR_LETTER_FILTER
        A filter that only accepts the Latin digits '0'-'9' or ASCII letters 'a'-'z' and 'A'-'Z'.

      • LATIN_DIGIT_FILTER

        static final CharFilter LATIN_DIGIT_FILTER
        A filter that only accepts the Latin digits '0'-'9'.

      • ASCII_LETTER_FILTER

        static final CharFilter ASCII_LETTER_FILTER
        A filter that only accepts the Latin ASCII letters 'a'-'z' and 'A'-'Z'.

      • ASCII_LOWER_CASE_LETTER_FILTER

        static final CharFilter ASCII_LOWER_CASE_LETTER_FILTER
        A filter that only accepts the lower case Latin ASCII letters 'a'-'z'.

      • ASCII_UPPER_CASE_LETTER_FILTER

        static final CharFilter ASCII_UPPER_CASE_LETTER_FILTER
        A filter that only accepts the upper case Latin ASCII letters 'A'-'Z'.

      • WHITESPACE_FILTER

        static final CharFilter WHITESPACE_FILTER
        A filter that accepts only whitespaces.

      • ACCEPT_ALL_FILTER

        static final CharFilter ACCEPT_ALL_FILTER
        A filter that accepts any charater.

      • FILE_SEPARATOR_FILTER

        static final CharFilter FILE_SEPARATOR_FILTER
        A filter that only accepts the file separator characters '/' and '\\'.

      • NEWLINE_FILTER

        static final CharFilter NEWLINE_FILTER
        CharFilter that accepts only carriage return ('\r') and line feed ('\n').

      • OCTAL_DIGIT_FILTER

        static final CharFilter OCTAL_DIGIT_FILTER
        CharFilter that accepts only the ocatal digits '0'-'7'.

      • HEX_DIGIT_FILTER

        static final CharFilter HEX_DIGIT_FILTER
        CharFilter that accepts only the hex digits '0'-'9', 'a'-'f', or 'A'-'F'.

    • Method Detail

      • accept

        boolean accept​(char c)
        Parameters:
        c - is the character to check.
        Returns:
        true if the given character c is acceptable, false if it should be filtered.

      • negate

        default CharFilter negate()
        Returns:
        the negation of this CharFilter that returns !accept(c).

      • compose

        default CharFilter compose​(CharFilter filter)
        Parameters:
        filter - the CharFilter to compose with.
        Returns:
        a ComposedCharFilter that accepts a character that is accepted by this OR the given CharFilter.
